attributes.additional_details:
For the healthy and safety of the public
For the healthy and safety of pets
Fireworks cause pain and stress on animal, causing seizurs, fit.
Even adults are scared of fireworks.
The only fireworks that should be allowed if for display purposes only that the public can attend thats been put on by professionals and a time from of use so we can prepare ourselves and our pets to stay calm
attributes.background: My dog and many dogs I know suffer with stress and anxiety and hearing these noises stressing them out to the max where the animal cant relax and starts to have fits and seizures

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
